Home.title: Front End Developer React and Next.js
Home.text: As a web developer specializing in front-end, I am proficient in technologies such as React, Next.js, Sass, and TypeScript to design modern and fully responsive interfaces. I also have knowledge in React Native and back-end development with PostgreSQL, Node.js, and Prisma, which allows me to understand the entire web development cycle. Passionate about my profession, I am constantly improving my skills to provide solutions that meet current needs.

CarouselHome.simonGame: Creation of a Simon game using React. Project to understand state management, component life cycles, and hooks.
CarouselHome.argentBank: Integration of a banking application, with authentication system via an API and a global store via Redux.
CarouselHome.ninaCarducci: Optimization of a photographer's website on natural referencing, performance, and accessibility.
CarouselHome.kasa: Integration of a real estate rental site. Project to manage routes, URL parameters, and implement CSS animations via Sass.
CarouselHome.qcm: Creation of a quiz application. Project to manage a database with an ORM, create an authentication system with a JWT token, and secure routes.
